    • Uses of ChoiceRequest in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.requests

      Subclasses of ChoiceRequest in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.requests 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActionRequest
      A specialized request to ask for the action the user wants to perform
      class  BoardRequest
      Represents the request of the board id at the beginning of the game
      class  EffectRequest
      Represents the request to choose which effect to use on a weapon
      class  PlayerOperationRequest
      A specialized request to ask for the operation to be performed during a turn
      class  PlayerRequest
      A specialized request to ask for the name of a player
      class  PowerupCardRequest
      A specialized request to ask for a powerup card
      class  SkullCountRequest
      Represents the request of the initial number of skulls to start the match
      class  SquareRequest
      A specialized request to ask for a coordinates pair (namely a square)
      class  WeaponCardRequest
      A specialized request to ask for a weapon card
